## RelayedTransactionV2Builder.setInnerTransactionGasLimit() method

Sets the gas limit to be used for the SC Call inside the inner transaction

**Signature:**

```typescript
setInnerTransactionGasLimit(gasLimit: IGasLimit): RelayedTransactionV2Builder;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  gasLimit | [IGasLimit](./sdk-core.igaslimit.md) | The gas limit to be used. The inner transaction needs to have the gas limit set to 0, so this field will specify the gas to be used for the SC call of the inner transaction |

**Returns:**

[RelayedTransactionV2Builder](./sdk-core.relayedtransactionv2builder.md)
